survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Car Wash Subscription Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and preferences regarding monthly car wash subscription services, focusing on service quality, convenience, and value for money.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current car wash subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and consistency with industry standards.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current car wash subscription service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a car wash subscription service? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Premium wash options (e.g., wax, undercarriage wash)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to identify top priorities without overwhelming respondents.

script.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a car wash subscription service? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Premium wash options (e.g., wax, undercarriage wash)

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use your car wash subscription per month?
questions.client_notes: Quantify usage to assess service value perception.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use your car wash subscription per month?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your car wash subscription service?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback; limit to 300 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your car wash subscription service?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your car wash subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple binary + neutral option to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your car wash subscription service to others?
